statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_traits
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM genetic_traits
SELECT trait_name, dominant_trait, recessive_trait FROM genetic_traits WHERE dominant_trait = TRUE
SELECT * FROM genetic_traits WHERE trait_id = 1
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM genetic_traits ORDER BY trait_name DESC
SELECT * FROM genetic_traits WHERE trait_name = 'Hair Color';
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM genetic_traits WHERE dominant_trait = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM genetic_traits WHERE recessive_trait = FALSE ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT trait_name, dominant_trait, recessive_trait FROM genetic_traits WHERE inheritance_pattern = 'Autosomal Dominant';
SELECT trait_id, trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM genetic_traits WHERE dominant_trait = TRUE AND recessive_trait = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM Traits ORDER BY trait_name ASC;
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM Traits WHERE trait_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Offspring WHERE inheritance_probability > 0.5 ORDER BY offspring_id DESC;
SELECT trait_name, COUNT(*) AS trait_count FROM Traits GROUP BY trait_name;
SELECT * FROM Traits JOIN Offspring ON Traits.trait_id = Offspring.parent_trait_id;
SELECT * FROM Traits WHERE trait_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY trait_id DESC
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_pattern FROM Traits WHERE trait_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY trait_id
SELECT * FROM Traits WHERE inheritance_pattern = 'Autosomal' AND trait_name != 'Brown Eyes'
SELECT trait_name, inheritance_probability FROM Traits JOIN Offspring ON Traits.trait_id = Offspring.parent_trait_id ORDER BY inheritance_probability DESC
SELECT * FROM Traits WHERE trait_id >= 3 AND trait_id <= 5
SELECT trait_id, trait_name, trait_description FROM GeneticTraits;
SELECT * FROM OffspringTraits WHERE parent1_trait_id = 1;
SELECT inheritance_id, parent_trait_id, child_trait_id, inheritance_pattern FROM TraitInheritance WHERE inheritance_pattern = 'Mendelian';
SELECT * FROM OffspringTraits WHERE inherited_trait_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT trait_id, trait_name FROM GeneticTraits ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM GeneticTraits;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM GeneticTraits ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM OffspringTraits WHERE parent1_trait_id = 2 AND parent2_trait_id = 4;
SELECT DISTINCT inherited_trait_id FROM OffspringTraits;
SELECT parent_trait_id, child_trait_id FROM TraitInheritance WHERE inheritance_pattern = 'Mendelian';
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_id, gene_name FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_id DESC;
SELECT trait_name, description FROM Traits WHERE description LIKE '%example%';
SELECT gene_name, inheritance_type FROM Genes JOIN Inheritance ON Genes.gene_id = Inheritance.gene_id;
SELECT individual_name, gender FROM Individuals WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT gene_name, inheritance_type FROM Genes;
SELECT individual_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Individuals WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Traits WHERE trait_name LIKE '%color%';
SELECT gene_name, gene_id FROM Genes ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT individual_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM Individuals ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_traits;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM genetic_traits;
SELECT family_name, location FROM families;
SELECT individual_name, age, gender FROM individuals;
SELECT * FROM trait_inheritance;
SELECT * FROM genetic_traits;
SELECT trait_name, trait_description FROM genetic_traits ORDER BY trait_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM families WHERE location IS NOT NULL;

SELECT individuals.individual_name, genetic_traits.trait_name, inheritance_patterns.pattern_type FROM individuals JOIN trait_inheritance ON individuals.individual_id = trait_inheritance.individual_id JOIN genetic_traits ON trait_inheritance.trait_id = genetic_traits.trait_id JOIN inheritance_patterns ON trait_inheritance.pattern_id = inheritance_patterns.pattern_id;

SELECT trait_name, pattern_type, individual_name FROM trait_inheritance JOIN genetic_traits ON trait_inheritance.trait_id = genetic_traits.trait_id JOIN inheritance_patterns ON trait_inheritance.pattern_id = inheritance_patterns.pattern_id JOIN individuals ON trait_inheritance.individual_id = individuals.individual_id WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY individual_name DESC;
